title: Action Plan 2017 - 2021 on National Human Rights
decision_details: - The formulation of the National Human Rights Action Plan 2017 - 2021 has been finalized as per the specific guidelines under the guidance of the Cabinet of Ministers. The Cabinet took note of the National Action Plan submitted by Hon. Ranil Wickremasinghe, the Prime Minister, and noted that an Officials' Committee will be established for reporting its progress periodically and that an Inter‑Ministerial meeting will be convened to review the progress of its implementation.
